title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: The Departed
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and filmmaker Amy Barrett discuss The Departed, a new crime thriller from Martin Scorsese. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
